creator: johan.adelow@corustechnologies.com
text:
I have used ant for some time now to build our product which involves loading a 
lot of complex PLSQL into oracle databases. The sql task could only do the 
simplest of these scripts so I started to modify the task sqltask with greate 
help from guido schreuder. I have now used the task for some time and sent it 
to other members of the ant users list so I thought I´d try to make it part of 
ants optional tasks and then call it forinstance oracle since it´s now very 
oracle specific.

Where should I send it, (cant attatch anything here)

/Johan Adelöw
johan.adelow@corustechnologies.com

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
You have first to create the bug and then you have a "create a new attachment" 
link where you can click on. It's just 2 lines above the comment box.

Come back here :-)
I don´t think such a specific task will be ever accept.
creator: vanHell@gmx.at

text:
Some enhancements have been made recently to the <sql> task. The enhancements 
include the ability to load plsql packages, functions, procedures, triggers, 
views, and types into an oracle database. These enhancements will be included 
in Ant 1.6 and are available in the nightly builds currently.
creator: riznob@hotmail.com
